message: Let's start fair. I get the lion's share, but you get something to start with. Let's see if we can agree.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky!  Time is money, and we're both losing value with each round. I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be reasonable and end this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a better share than your previous offer.  Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than I would get if I accepted your previous offer in the next round! Let's end this before we both lose out more.
